item.title: BAC
item.description: score:978 Chances: Bank of America announced a corrected dividend amount on the Fixed-to-Floating Rate Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series U, payable on September 1, 2023. Bank of America has raised the yield on a $500 million blue bond for Gabon to attract investor interest.
